title: Red vs blue Out of Mind logo font
content:
Hello everyone, I'm looking for the font of a Red vs Blue title season, "Out of Mind", to make a personal composition in Photoshop. I thought it would be easy, because the letter "F" is highly characteristic, but I can't even manage to find something similar.

If anybody knows this font, could he tell me what it is? Thanks in advance.

Sébastien C.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rvb_OoM_x360_banner_6272.png)

Font: 

 Arnprior 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112454/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: sebkotaro

comments.content:
not sure if it will help anyone, but here are a few more characters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/436352601_640_5517.jpg)

"Red vs Blue" is **[Jenkins](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112454/http:/www.fontalicious.com/project/jenkins-v2-0/)** by Font-a-licious

"OUT OF MIND" is **[Arnprior](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112454/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Arnprior%20-%20Regular&fid=00e75bced521ec4679a32a07795b71c9&fsize=60&text=OUT%20OF%20MIND%20EPISODE%20IV&wrap=2)** free font by Ray Larabie (Typodermic, 1997)

PS: Jodie, thanks for the large image ;)
Oh my… seriously, thank you very much, guys ! ^v^
